EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Stream Processing in the Cloud w/Data Microservices.Confirmatio
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Stream Processing in the Cloud with Data Microservices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Stream Processing in the Cloud with Data Microservices on Tuesday, March 22, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Tuesday, March 22, 2016 Time: 10:00AM PDT (San Francisco, CA)
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1155068/6A0C509916C84D2CE7B414CD2E42F746]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
